root.name: Pocoro
root.description: Pocoro is a simplistic puzzle game in which the player must move a ball around a board and get to the exit. Each tile has a number which corresponds to the amount of times you move on it before it turns black. The overall object is to 100% a level by touching all tiles the correct number of times and making it to the exit.The game has a very minimalist design with a relaxing soundtrack and a simplistic yet charming visual style.
